#---- APM ------------------------

*** Key Words ***
Prepare AE
    Log    Prepare AE
    Vm Connect    @{VM}
    #Vm Revert    ${AE_HOST}    fresh
    Log    This step should do the copy client

Prepare Package
    [Arguments]    ${packageName}
    Log    Prepare package
    #Apm Connect    @{APM}[0]    @{APM}[1]    @{APM}[2]    @{APM}[3]    @{APM}[4]
    #Apm Run    install ${packageName} -pw 123 -y
